name: Brooks Method 8" Short Tights - Women's
description:
Own your run. These short tights provide light support and coverage for warm weather training. Bounce-free pockets hold your phone, keys, and snacks securely.Breathable DryLayer polyester and spandex wicks moisture and adds easy movement.Perforated zones vent excess heat.Elastic waistband has a stretch internal drawcord for a comfortable fit.High-rise waist adds coverage.

        Sustainability
